description: **pd-neimog** is a collection of objects, tools, and integrations for **Pure Data (Pd)** that I use in my work. It focus on Signal Manipulation, Statistics, Music Information Retrieval (MIR), Python/Lua scripting, and include all my libraries: `pd-partialtrack`, `pd-saf`, `pd-vamp`, `pd-server`, `pd-ambi`, `pd-upic`, and also some libraries I fork, update or simply use: `kalman-pd` `SOFAlizer-for-pd` `earplug~`, and more
